column5: Guys be aware of a Home Depot parking lot scam.  A "heads up" for those men who may be regular Home Depot customers.  Over the last month I became a victim of a clever scam while out shopping. Simply going out to get supplies has turned out to be quite traumatic. Don't be naive enough to think it couldn't happen to you or your friends.  Here's how the scam works:  Two seriously good looking girls come over to your car as you are packing your materials into your vehicle. They both start wiping your windshield with a towel and Windex and with their breasts almost falling out of their skimpy T-shirts it almost impossible not to look.  When you thank them and offer them a tip, they say '"no" and instead ask you for a ride to McDonalds. You agree and they get in the back of the truck. On the way, they start undressing then one of them climbs over into the front seat and starts crawling all over you, while the other one steals your wallet.  I had my wallet stolen June 4th, 9th, 10th, twice on the 15th, 17th, 20th, 24th, and the 29th and again on July 1st, the 4th and twice on the 8th, 16th and the 23rd.  So tell your friends to be careful.  BTW Wal-Mart has wallets on sale 1.99 each. HH
Thank you for being so selfless and giving the rest of us a heads up. Just to be certain, can you tell us exactly which location this happened at
Man that SUCKS!!!!!!! The nearest Home Depot is 1500km away!!!!
no worries, i just went to dollarama and purchased a bunch of wallets that i keep empty at all times. goin to HD tonight
was it the same that scamed GBW last year?
Now I know why you can't leave town tomorrow Joe !
Joe's been wearing lacy, ladies undergarments for the last 3 years now. Ever since his wife found them in his glove box.
I just got back from Home Depot, what a trip! Now I need to buy a new wallet and head back ASAP.

"I had my wallet stolen June 4th, 9th, 10th, twice on the 15th, 17th, 20th, 24th, and the 29th and again on July 1st, the 4th and twice on the 8th, 16th and the 23rd."  WOW!!  Took your time learning your 'lesson', didn't ya Hh??  I'm almost inclined to think you enjoyed having your 'wallet stolen'... LMAO!  Os
Don't cry, Drifter...  there must be other places you can go to if you feel like having your 'wallet stolen'.

Don't forget the pink rubber gloves as well Roy! These big box stores get a bad rap from far too many people... here's a  perfect example of getting a little extra value for your money... simply buy a hot dog from the vendor outside the Home Depot, meet up with the ladies and viola!... dinner and a show! LMAO HH
hahah... Great another excuse to go too Homedepot
Yeah, but they look like the South End of a North Bound Moose and are addicted to CRACK!!!!!!
Give Home Depot a call, they'll surely have a solution for you... 'YOU CAN DO IT, WE CAN HELP'!!
Good one...  lol....   I'll be there tomorrow....  Tiz
Man, I was really buying into that story.... until I realized it's been kinda cold for skirts...lol
you mean thay are back at it in Ontario?!??!?!  WOOHOO!  I'm off to the $1 store to some wallets then off to HD!!!!
Cool 40 below with the wind chill.  Cant wait to see how.  Well them Antlers get in the cold.
